entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.1°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
